API_Description: Exports the text content of the PDF document as a string, with options to include all fields, exclude password-protected content, specify fields, and more.
API_Description_Reason: The method name 'exportAsTextStr' suggests it exports text content as a string. The parameters indicate options for including fields, handling passwords, and specifying output format, which aligns with exporting text data.
Returns: A string containing the exported text content of the PDF document.
Returns_Reason: The method name includes 'Str', which typically indicates a string return type, and the context of exporting text suggests the return value is the text content as a string.

bAllFields.description: Indicates whether to include all fields in the export.
bAllFields.description_reason: The parameter name 'bAllFields' suggests a boolean flag to include all fields in the export process.
bAllFields.type_reason: The 'b' prefix in 'bAllFields' is a common convention for boolean types.

bNoPassword.description: Specifies whether to exclude password-protected content from the export.
bNoPassword.description_reason: The parameter name 'bNoPassword' implies a boolean option to handle password-protected content during export.
bNoPassword.type_reason: The 'b' prefix in 'bNoPassword' is a common convention for boolean types.

aFields.description: An array specifying which fields to include in the export.
aFields.description_reason: The parameter name 'aFields' suggests a collection of fields, likely an array, to specify which fields to include.
aFields.type_reason: The 'a' prefix in 'aFields' is a common convention for array types.

bFlags.description_reason: The parameter name 'bFlags' suggests it is used to pass boolean flags that alter the export process.
bFlags.type_reason: The 'b' prefix in 'bFlags' is a common convention for boolean types.

cHRef.description: A string representing a hyperlink reference to include in the export.

cHRef.type_reason: The 'c' prefix in 'cHRef' is a common convention for string types.

bBase64.description: Indicates whether to encode the exported text as a Base64 string.

bBase64.type_reason: The 'b' prefix in 'bBase64' is a common convention for boolean types.
